title: Visualizing Your Dating Situation with Chart Enthusiast Charlotte Warren
description:
This episode is brought to you by Nuuly. You can get $20 off your first month of Nuuly when you sign up with the code MATCHMAKERMARIA20. 

Visit https://bit.ly/nuulymatchmakermaria.


In this episode, Maria shares insane text screenshots sent to her from our listeners. Maria dissects these with her podcast producer and the host of the Meet a Stranger podcast, Matt Haze.


Follow Matt on Instagram at http://instagram.com/matthaze 


Listen to the Meet a Stranger podcast…

Apple: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/meet-a-stranger/id1624565485 

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/1QJqZCICH7mYa7jrISduvF 


Then, Maria welcomes one of her favorite TikTokers, Charlotte Warren!  She’s been blowing up on the app by explaining dating and relationships with charts!! Can a casual situation be exclusive? There’s a chart for that. Need to know how cuffing season works? A chart is available to assist! Be sure to check out her links to see her great work!


See all of the charts at https://medium.com/@welcometothepeasantparty 


Check out Charlotte’s TikTok at https://www.tiktok.com/@welcometothepeasantparty 


Follow Charlotte on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/charty805/ 


Follow Matchmaker Maria on Instagram at http://instagram.com/matchmakermaria and to learn more about Agape Match, visit http://agapematch.com or visit http://agapeintensive.com to enroll in an upcoming group intensive, hosted by Maria. 


#Escape2Paros2023 registration is open! Visit http://agapeescapes.com to reserve your spot for next year's trip!
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
